title: Saag Paneer
directions: Fill a kettle with 2 qt (2 L) water and bring to a boil. In a large mixing bowl, add spinach and pour boiling water over top. Let stand for 3 minutes, then drain. In a food processor, purée spinach.
Cut paneer into 34-in (2-cm) cubes. In a large non-stick frying pan on medium, heat oil. Add paneer and fry until browned on three sides.

Remove paneer and set aside. To frying pan, add leeks and sauté until golden, about 3 minutes. Add coriander, cumin, and mustard seeds, and stir for 1 minute. Add spinach, cayenne, salt, and 12 cup (125 mL) water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in yogurt. Return paneer to pan and coat with spinach mixture.
